title: Army secures medals in Asian Cross Country Championship in India
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Defence announced on Sunday (27) that the Sri Lanka Army’s Sergeant R.M.S Pushpakumara of 5 Sri Lanka Artillery won the Silver medal in the Asian Cross-Country Running Championship, held recently at Nagaland, India.
The Army men’s team emerged as the overall runners-up in the event while two women competitors emerged as overall women’s runners-up during this competition, the Army sources said.
Army secures medals in Asian Cross Country Championship in India
NO intention of appointing Ranil Wickremesinghe as Prime Minister – SLPP
